Isabella Rodriguez.description: conversing about two friends, Isabella and Maria, discussing what dishes they will bring to the Potluck event, making plans to meet before the event to go over a physics assignment, and catching up on Isabella's successful sociology paper on gentrification. @ <persona> Maria Lopez
chat: Isabella Rodriguez
Hey Maria! I'm so glad to see you here. Are you excited for the Potluck tomorrow?
Maria Lopez
Hey Isabella! Yes, I'm really looking forward to it. What dish are you bringing?
Isabella Rodriguez
I'm bringing a vegan lasagna and buffalo chicken dip. What about you?
Maria Lopez
I'm planning on bringing my specialty baked macaroni and cheese! It's always a hit at events.
Isabella Rodriguez
That sounds delicious! I can't wait to try your baked macaroni and cheese. We should definitely save each other a taste tomorrow.
Maria Lopez
We should also discuss the physics assignment during the Potluck, I could use some help understanding a few concepts.
Isabella Rodriguez
Of course, I'd be happy to help you with the physics assignment. Let's plan on meeting before the Potluck to go over it together.
Maria Lopez
Thank you, Isabella! I really appreciate your help with the physics assignment. Let's meet up at 3 pm tomorrow at the library to go over it.
Isabella Rodriguez
That sounds like a plan! I'll see you at the library at 3 pm tomorrow.
Maria Lopez
By the way, how did your sociology paper on gentrification in low-income communities go? I remember you mentioning it the other day.
Isabella Rodriguez
Oh, the sociology paper went well! Klaus and I had a great discussion about it. I'll fill you in on all the details at the Potluck tomorrow.
Maria Lopez
That's great to hear! I'm glad your sociology paper went well. Can't wait to catch up more at the Potluck tomorrow!
Isabella Rodriguez
I'm just finishing up here at the cafe. Do you need any help with anything before I head out?
Maria Lopez
Thank you, Isabella! I think I'm all set here. See you tomorrow at the Potluck!
Isabella Rodriguez
Great, I'll see you tomorrow at the Potluck then! Have a wonderful evening!
Maria Lopez
Thank you again for offering to help with the physics assignment. I really appreciate your support!

Klaus Mueller.description: working on his research paper in the library (writing the body paragraphs) @ the Ville:Oak Hill College:library:library table
